sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Sysklogd package contains the klogd and syslogd programs.

sect3.title: klogd
sect3.para: klogd is a system daemon which intercepts and logs Linux kernel messages.

sect3.title: syslogd
sect3.para: Syslogd provides a kind of logging that many modern programs use. Every logged message contains at least a time and a hostname field, normally a program name field, too, but that depends on how trusty the logging program is.
